markdownRemark.html:
A notable takeaway from Dave Wascha’s 20 Years of Product Management in 25 Minutes is that companies often loose sight of their own mission and begin to solve their own problems as opposed to solving their customers’ problems.

It’s the responsibility of the product organization to prevent such drift - to fight for the customer and ensure their problems are prioritized.
